LanguageData.VME_PsychicSensitivity_Lowered.label: lowered
LanguageData.VME_PsychicSensitivity_Lowered.descripti: Barricade your mind to all thoughts that aren’t your own. Let your mind be a veritable fortress of unwavering mental constitution.
LanguageData.VME_PsychicSensitivity_Heightened.label: heightened
LanguageData.VME_PsychicSensitivity_Heightened.descri: Reach with your mind to encompass the whole world. Let your mind be a swift weapon of psychic retribution.
